pr_title: [RESTEASY-2569]  RestClient does not propogate incoming headers

timeline.message: [RESTEASY-2569]  RestClient does not propogate incoming headers with inherited Interface

timeline.bodyText:
It would be better if the verification that incoming headers are propagated from parent interface methods is added as a separate test.
This changes removes the verification that passing client headers is inherited into a child interface
timeline.author: kenfinnigan

replies.bodyText: Sorry, ignore this. Not sure why I thought the subclass was already there
replies.author: kenfinnigan
